name: 余烬
description: "Ashes of war" is an anti war theme adventure decryption game, the story takes place in the western region during the Anti Japanese war. In the game, the player will control the strong and brave brothers and sisters. After a series of checkpoints, they will fight against the evil Japanese and escape from the heaven with the help of a kind Japanese soldier
developers: 宁夏华夏西部影视城有限公司
publishers: 宁夏华夏西部影视城有限公司
